meanings.sent1: The forest became murkest as the sun set behind the mountains.
meanings.sent2: The room was at its murkest during the power outage.
meanings.sent3: The murkest sky made the stars twinkle even brighter.
meanings.sent4: Her mood was as murkest as the storm clouds gathering above.
meanings.sent5: The old, abandoned house had the murkest atmosphere imaginable.

meanings.sent1: The water in the pond looked murkest after the heavy rain.
meanings.sent2: The instructions were written in the murkest handwriting imaginable.
meanings.sent3: His excuse for being late was so murkest that no one believed him.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were as murkest as a muddy puddle.
meanings.sent5: The glass of the window was so murkest that you couldn't see through it.

meanings.sent1: The murkest path through the woods led to a hidden clearing.
meanings.sent2: The details of the contract were intentionally made murkest to confuse the competitors.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick left the audience in a murkest state of wonder.
meanings.sent4: The conspiracy theory was so murkest that it left everyone scratching their heads.
meanings.sent5: The ancient map was full of murkest symbols that no one could decipher.
